We are grateful to Mr. Tagg and Mr. Bell.

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

Another report but we need action. @EnvAgency must address the waste producers and not allow claimed ignorance as a defence. The UK needs to address worsening environmental issues and quickly. https://t.co/8Xc9VfKAwM

urls.title: Staff seeking loopholes 'key driver' of waste crime says EU | MRW
urls.description: The EC also found the UK's estimated income from the illegal waste market is streets ahead of any EU country, at a mid-point estimate of around €2.6bn
